	Experience with legal recovery processes and external agents.

Collections & Recovery Manager Job at Strivo Labs




        
    

        
        At Strivo Labs, we are passionate about helping businesses scale with speed and precision. We specialise in providing end-to-end digital solutions, from custom design and MVP development to automation and content creation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Collections & Recovery Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Strivo Labs is recruiting a Collections & Recovery Manager for a client to lead loan collections and recovery operations.
	This role focuses on enhancing portfolio performance, reducing delinquency, and ensuring compliant and ethical recovery practices.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute collections and recovery strategies across early, mid, and late delinquency stages.
	Lead and manage collections teams and third-party recovery partners to meet performance targets.
	Monitor key portfolio metrics (PAR, roll rates, cure and recovery rates) and provide regular reports.
	Improve collections workflows, escalation processes, and recovery efficiency.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies.
	Oversee repayment negotiations, restructures, and escalated customer cases.


Requirements


	3–7 years of experience in collections, recovery, or credit operations.
	Proven experience managing collections or recovery teams.
	Strong understanding of loan products, delinquency management, and recovery strategies.
	Experience with legal recovery processes and external agents.
	Strong analytical, communication, and stakeholder management skills


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, salary expectations, and a short note about their experience to: hiring@strivolabs.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Job Location: Gwarimpa, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
